  • News Explorer Is a Pretty Great Feed Reader

    I am currently using News Explorer for reading feeds. There are clients for both iOS and Mac, and they are improving all the time. What I like most about it is that it syncs over iCloud rather than via some third party service. It works really well, and I don’t have to depend on some service to continue existing forever. I keep the data in my own little iCloud silo.

     04 February 2018
